shipping.title: Shipping Method

estimated_delivery_date.one: 1 day to process + 1 business day (friday orders ship monday, no weekend delivery)
estimated_delivery_date.other: 1 day to process + {{count}} business days (friday orders ship monday, no weekend delivery)

shipping.estimated_delivery_date_range: 1 day to process + {{minimum}} to {{maximum}} business days (friday orders ship monday, no weekend delivery)
shipping.shipping_method_notice: Carrier estimates, not guaranteed. Same day shipping cutoff is 12pm EST Monday-Friday (orders placed after the Friday cutoff or over the weekend are shipped Monday).

marketing.accept_marketing_checkbox_label:
----> Keep me up to date on news and exclusive offers for www.storelli.com.
______________________________________________________________________________________
I agree to allow Storelli.com to send me marketing emails, and share my email with Facebook and/or other third parties solely for the purposes of marketing Storelli.com.

contact.optional_phone_label: Phone for support, chat and special offers
contact.phone_tooltip: In case you want us to contact you about discounts and recommendations

shipping_errors.shipping_method_not_available: Ugh... we're actually out of stock in your country for one or all items in your cart. Really really sorry... please email support@storellisports.com if you'd like to back-order or ship from our warehouse abroad

tips.title: Add tip to help us fund R&D
tips.description: Show your support for the R&D team at {{ shop_name }}
tips.message: We really appreciate your help ❤️ - we will put it to good use!
